product_name: Topeak SideKick STW Wedge Bike Seat Pack
long_description: Topeak SideKick STW Wedge bike seat pack includes a 16-piece tool kit, is easy to install and offers extra space and easy access for your riding essentials. QuickClick(TM) mounting is a proprietary quick-release mounting system that allows fast and easy tool-free mounting; simply slide and click and the bag is secure. Semirigid, weather-resistant saddle bag features molded side panels that zip open sideways to provide easy access to contents. One side panel features a 16-piece tool kit with pockets for each tool; kit includes common Allen wrench sizes, 8mm and 10mm wrenches, tire levers, chain breaker and patch kit. Other side panel features organizational pockets and allows instant access to your riding essentials, energy bars, keys and more. 3M(TM) reflective detailing on the Topeak SideKick STW Wedge seat pack increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: Topeak SideKick STW Wedge bike seat pack includes a 16-piece tool kit, is easy to install and offers extra space and easy access for your riding essentials.
